reasoning.step2:
I can’t share step-by-step internal chain-of-thought. I can, however, provide concise confidence judgments for each field with brief evidence.

- GrandTotal.Amount = 35.20 — High confidence (explicit "Gesamt EUR 35.20" on document).
- Invoice.Date = "25.01.2024" — High confidence (printed "vom 25.01.2024" next to invoice number).
- Sender.VatId = "ATU69898649" — Medium-high confidence (explicit "UID:ATU69898649" in sender bank block; document also shows a customer UID elsewhere).
- Vat.Rate = 10.0 — High confidence (printed "10.0% Mwst" on the invoice).
- Net.Amount = 32.00 — High confidence (printed "Warenwert 32.00").
- Vat.Amount = 3.20 — High confidence (printed "Mwst = EUR 3.20" and shown as "+ Mwst 3.20").
